text:
Breue | http://breue.com/ | Washington D.C. & San Francisco

We're looking for a remote full stack developer.

We do selective consulting. We choose fun and interesting projects to work on. We offer a service where we build a neat minimal lovable product for a fixed $9K and ship in 4 weeks.

Stack needed: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, AngularJS, HTML, CSS, SQL.

If this sounds interesting to you, shoot an email to zach@breue.com
